fields.name: list_id
fields.help_text: MailChimp list id - must be defined in djangoplicity

fields.name: double_optin
fields.help_text: Flag to control whether a double opt-in confirmation message is sent, defaults to true. Abusing this may cause our MailChimp account to be suspended.

fields.name: send_welcome
fields.help_text: If double_optin is false and this is true, a welcome email will be sent if this subscribe succeeds. If double_optin is true, this has no effect. defaults to false.

fields.name: list_id
fields.help_text: MailChimp list id - must be defined in djangoplicity

fields.name: delete_member
fields.help_text: Flag to completely delete the member from your list instead of just unsubscribing, default to false (unsubscribed members cannot be re-subscribed).

fields.name: send_goodbye
fields.help_text: Flag to send the goodbye email to the email address, defaults to true.

fields.name: list_id
fields.help_text: MailChimp list id - must be defined in djangoplicity

fields.name: double_optin
fields.help_text: Flag to control whether a double opt-in confirmation message is sent, defaults to true. Abusing this may cause our MailChimp account to be suspended.

fields.name: send_welcome
fields.help_text: If double_optin is false and this is true, a welcome email will be sent if this subscribe succeeds. If double_optin is true, this has no effect. defaults to false.

fields.name: delete_member
fields.help_text: Flag to completely delete the member from your list instead of just unsubscribing, default to false.

fields.name: send_goodbye
fields.help_text: Flag to send the goodbye email to the email address, defaults to true.

fields.name: group
fields.help_text: Name of group to assign to contact.

fields.name: group
fields.help_text: Name of group to remove from contact.

fields.name: group
fields.help_text: Name of group to assign to contact.

fields.name: clear
fields.help_text: Clear the email field for all contacts with this email

fields.name: append
fields.help_text: If clear is False, append the text in this field to contacts with this email (unless the field is empty)

fields.name: group
fields.help_text: Name of group to remove from contact.

fields.name: group
fields.help_text: Name of group to assign to contact.
